title: Chapter 188 - How Dare You Harm My Man
body:
Chapter 188 - How Dare You Harm My Man


Yao Si took it that the grand prince title would be awarded to the pure breed with the strongest ability. Just a look at the sky full of red light rays was enough to attest for the guy’s unimaginable power.


She couldn’t help feeling relief about destroying the portal so decisively. If more of these horrifying pure breeds were to come over, any number of galaxies would be destroyed.


Even though he was strong, if both Mu Xuan and Lin Long were to join hands… Fine! There was still absolutely no chance of winning.


○|￣|_


A bolt of red ray pierced Lin Long, sending him backward. Blood burst out from him endlessly.


“Lin Long!” Lian Yu screamed as she held onto his bloodstained body, her eyes tearing up. “How are you?”


“Are you alright?” Yao Si asked with concern. In order to open up the portal, both Mu Xuan and Lin Long had already exhausted a large chunk of their abilities, so they had little chance to win.


Besides, the grand prince was way too strong. He had managed to annihilate Lin Long’s attack in a matter of seconds.


Without the interference, the grand prince directed his attack at his original targets once more. The rays fell onto the protective barrier repeatedly, their intensity increasing with each blow. Gradually, cracks started to form.


“Our abilities are suppressed by the blood prison!” Lin Long coughed out a mouthful of blood as he pointed toward the red glow above them. “He has absolute authority here, and there isn’t any ability that can surpass his.”


F*ck, so that was the reason he built the prison. It explained why Lin Long’s ability had been deal with so swiftly.


What could she do then? What could she do?


“If we can’t use our abilities, we can use something else,” Mu Xuan said in a low voice. He wiped the bloodstain on his lips before taking a step forward.


What did that mean?


“If we can’t use our abilities…” Lin Long took a while to process his words, but when he did, his eyes went wide. “Are you perhaps… You’re crazy, look at the state you are in!” He wanted to use his mental strength!


“Do you have any other suggestions?”


“…” Lin Long was silent.


If their abilities were restricted, the only thing they could use was their mental strength. But mental strength was one’s consciousness, so if…


Yao Si understood it as well, and her heart sank as her grip tightened around Mu Xuan’s shirt. She lifted her head to glance up at him. “Mu Xuan…”


“Don’t worry, everything will be alright.” Mu Xuan raised his hand to caress her head before adding, “Trust me.”


“…” She tightened her fists before releasing them slowly.


Mu Xuan moved her behind him, then a monumental strength came blasting from him. It penetrated the sky full of red light and headed straight for the grand prince.


The ancestor was caught off guard and took a direct hit.


Success!


Yao Si ‘s spirits lifted, but on closer inspection, she realized that the effects were fleeting. The grand prince shook himself slightly before straightening, his hollow dark eyes staring straight at them. “You intend to retaliate with mental strength? At your level… heh!”


A layer of golden aura formed around him, reflecting Mu Xuan’s mental strength.


“Is it useless?” Yao Si’s heart chilled.


“No, it’s useful!” Lin Long exclaimed. “His consciousness was damaged, or he’d be attacking instead of putting up a protective barrier.” He glanced up at Mu Xuan. “Not bad at all, Mu. I only knew of your perverted ability, but I never expected that your mental strength would be so perverted as well. You really aren’t human!”


“…” Is that how you compliment others?


“Push on, as long as you penetrate his consciousness, we will be able to win!”


“Heh! I’ll kill all of you before you can do that!” The grand prince smirked, but his face was a little pale. The next moment, a ferocious attack headed straight for them, clouding their vision red.


Pssh…


The bloodstains on the corner of Mu Xuan’s lips started to increase as more cracks showed up on their barrier.


“F*ck!” Lin Long cursed in frustration. He stood up and gathered all the power within him to summon up another barrier. The next round of attacks smashed straight through the outer barrier onto Lin Long’s barrier.


It wasn’t of comparable strength, and the instant the red light rays made contact, he spat out countless mouthfuls of blood. It was a ghastly sight.


“Lin Long!” Lian Yu was at a loss. She was trembling all over as tears poured out from her eyes.


Lin Long gritted his teeth and glanced over at Mu Xuan who was trying to penetrate the grand prince’s mental defense. “Push on, Mu! I’m at my limit. You just need to penetrate that defense, just need to—” He spat out another mouthful of blood.


Penetrate that defense, we just need to penetrate that layer of defense?


Yao Si glanced at the bloodstained Lin Long before turning toward the pale Mu Xuan, and gritted her teeth. She was going to go all out as well! She then activated all her mental strength.


“F*ck, what are you doing?” Lin Long exclaimed in shock, being the first to detect her actions. “Don’t be rash. You won’t be able to help with your mental strength; you probably won’t even be able to walk… Eh?”


Before he could finish his sentence, Yao Si’s mental strength flashed toward the grand prince like a ray of light that hit his head in physical form.


Er…


Was that mental strength? Wasn’t that a f*cking tile?


(⊙_⊙)


Lin Long stilled, and a red light ray penetrated the barrier, heading straight for Mu Xuan who was shielding Yao Si. She felt a red light ray slide past her, and the next moment, a warm liquid dripped from Mu Xuan’s side, splashing onto her face.


“Mu… Xuan…”


Her ears started to buzz. It was as though the entire world had went silent, leaving only Mu Xuan with his wound that was still bleeding profusely and his pupils that were a sea of red. Something exploded in Yao Si’s mind, and a strong force gushed out from within her. Together with an impossible to suppress power, it rushed out toward her target.


“F*ck, how dare you hurt my man? I’m going to kill you!”


A white glow exploded from within Yao Si, blanketing the entire galaxy. The sea of red disappeared instantly, and even the red prison surrounding them went away.


The square tiles on the grandprince’s head multiplied instantly. There were about a hundred of them, green on the underside and white on the top with a striking image in the middle. With a resounding explosion, the bloodling prince’s mental strength shattered, but the mahjong tiles continued to stack. One circle 1 … another circle… and another circle…


Yao Si only had one thought… to kill!


“…” Lin Long.


“…” Lian Yu.


“…” Mu Xuan.
